messageLines: But that doesn’t matter to us.
We want real feedback, not a finished plan.

items.title: SheStars
items.description: A platform for women. Female founders share their experiences.

items.title: Startup Arena
items.description: Pitch & investment day. Young founders present their ideas to investors.

items.title: StartupTalks
items.description: Pitch & investment day. Young founders present their ideas to investors.

storiesSection.title: Ideas we believed in — now grown into companies
quotes: The best projects aren’t born perfect.
On the contrary, those that start from nothing go the farthest.
Do you say, “I’m not ready yet”? That’s normal. We hear it all the time.

missionSection.title: We’re the first to believe in your startups.
missionSection.subtitle: Every big idea starts with a little bit of trust

highlightBanner.part1: The letter in our logo is a bird.
highlightBanner.part2: Because every idea wants to take flight. All you need is a little trust and a guiding wing — and we’ll be that wing.

missionStatement.part2: Because an idea always starts with a small bit of trust
missionStatement.description: Yoshlar Ventures is a fund for young people who have an idea but not yet a finished product. We listen to you, support you, and connect you with government bodies, investors, and industry experts.

promoSection.quote: While you’re sitting there saying “I’m not ready yet,” others are getting investment for their ideas. Seize the opportunity!
